column4: you should familiarize yourself with the community section of help.ubuntu.com
it's an EXCELLENT resource for all things Ubuntu
hmm i'll keep that in mind.... i prefer most forms of help as long as i don't have to look at man files...some are just...hard to follow
the guides there have been super-helpful in all the installations on the many computers I've done. I usually don't have to look much further than there.
